Name: Boston Deluxe
Ingredients: 15 ml Saffron syrup (2:1 sugar syrup heated with saffron fronds)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: A citrusy take on a bourbon sour, spiced with saffron.
History: Created in 2012 by Nicolas Kröger at the Rivoli Bar, Ritz Hotel, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Boston Deluxe contains 180 calories
